pkgmetadata.longdescription: Greedy Expected Posterior Loss // Summarises a collection of partitions into a single optimal partition. The objective function is the expected posterior loss, and the minimisation is performed through a greedy algorithm described in Rastelli, R. and Friel, N. (2017) "Optimal Bayesian estimators for latent variable cluster models" DOI:10.1007/s11222-017-9786-y.
